Model Building

Functions for PGCGenomicSignatures model buildling

.calculateSilhouetteWidth()

Calculate Silhouette Information of PCclusters

.PCclusterName()

Formatting PCcluster name

buildAvgLoading()

Calculate average loadings of each cluster

commonGene()

Common genes from datasets

findStudiesInCluster()

Find the studies contributing each PCcluster

PCinCluster()

Extract the list of PCs in a cluster

rmNaInf()

Remove missing and Inf values from expression dataset

rowNorm()

z-score each row of the data

Model Application

Functions for applying PGCGenomicSignatures model to a new data

.loadingCor()

Validating new dataset

calculateScore()

Calculate the validation score for a new dataset

drawWordcloud()

Draw wordcloud using the collection of PCclusters' MeSH terms

extractPC()

PCA on gene expression profile

heatmapTable()

Validation result in heatmap format

makeGeneList()

Order genes in loading vectors

meshTable()

Build a two-column word/frequency table

plotValidate()

Plot validation results in an interactive graph

run_gsea()

GSEA on pre-ordered gene lists

subsetPathways()

Subset enriched pathways of loading vectors

validate()

Validate new datasets

validatedIndex()

Validation result in data frame
